Read in behavioral data

What does behavior look like?

Distribution of response times

```{r}
beh_data %>%
  ggplot()+
  geom_histogram(aes(reactionTime), bins=50)
```

There are some too short/negative RTs. Exclude those.

```{r}
beh_data %>% 
  group_by(session) %>%
  summarise(mean_rt = mean(reactionTime))
```
